name: Coins Collector Simulator
description:
Welcome in the racing simulator game: Coins Collector Simulator! The game takes place in the city "Collectorus" where you will have complete freedom. Taxi driver or policeman, it doesn't matter here, you just have to collect all the coins!

Remember that your cars are powered by electricity, so they can be discharged fairly quickly if you don't power them.

Game Features:
- A big open-world style city
- 7 vehicles to choose from
- Collectable energy & coins
- Speedometer & battery
- 4 camera modes
